nodes.text: Queen Yram's Needle was a narrow obelisk created to memorialize the former Monarch of Naboo, Queen Yram.

Constructed in the city of Theed not far from the Royal Palace of Naboo, this narrow, pointed obelisk was built to memorialize the rule of the monarch, Queen Yram. Located in a courtyard near to one of the Solleu River's many tributaries and the falls which arched over the city's cliff face, the Needle was in walking distance of the city concert hall.
